The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 May is 41,937 (4,853.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 April, there were 140 new confirmed cases (16.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 April, there were 126 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% (14 extra cases).
